rss_ringoccs.tools.write_output_files module¶

write_output_files.py

Purpose:

Functions relating to writing an output file.
Dependencies:
  1. sys
  2. pds3_geo_series
  3. pds3_cal_series
  4. pds3_dlp_series
  5. pds3_tau_series

rss_ringoccs.tools.write_output_files.construct_filepath(rev_info, filtyp)¶
rss_ringoccs.tools.write_output_files.construct_output_filename(rev_info, inst, filtyp)¶
rss_ringoccs.tools.write_output_files.write_output_files(inst)¶

Write output (geo, cal, dlp, tau) *.TAB and *.LBL files, depending on instance given.

Args:
inst (instance):
Instance of either Geometry, Calibration, NormDiff, or DiffractionCorrection classes.
